definitions.definition: To attribute a cause or characteristic to someone or something.
definitions.example: One may ascribe these problems to the federal government; however, at this stage it is unclear what caused them.

definitions.definition: To attribute a book, painting or any work of art or literature to a writer or creator.
definitions.example: It is arguable as to whether we can truly ascribe this play to Shakespeare.

definitions.definition: (with to) To believe in or agree with; subscribe.
